attributes.action: There should be a Me 2 rule for boys at school.
attributes.additional_details: Because boys are made to feel that their behaviour is constantly under threat of being misunderstood and used as a weapon against them.
attributes.background: I want you to consider a me 2 rule for boys at school because boys can also suffer from sexual harassment but this is often overlooked or not acted upon.

rejection.details:
Schools are responsible for protecting the welfare of all students, irrespective of their sex.

If you have been a victim of sexual harassment or are concerned about your school's policy on sexual harassment you should speak to your parents or a teacher about this.

If you want to speak to someone about sexual harassment in school you could contact Childline: https://www.childline.org.uk/
